## About this Project
This is my personal portfolio website. It is primarily my own work, and I am maintaining full control over the content and structure.

## Contribution Guidelines
- I welcome contributions **only if absolutely necessary**.
- Before submitting a PR, please ensure that your changes are essential and clearly improve the project.
- Minor suggestions or cosmetic changes may not be merged.
- Please provide a clear and concise description of the changes you are proposing.

---

Thank you for respecting the nature of this personal project!
